official_title: A bill to amend the Community Services Act of 1974 to permit the Director of Community Services Administration to furnish assistance for the installation of security devices in the residences of elderly persons.

summary.text: Amends the Community Services Act of 1974 to permit the Director of the Community Services Administration to furnish assistance for the installation of security devices in the residences of elderly persons.
